Aji-Dahaka.name: Aji-Dahaka
Aji-Dahaka.description: "This Eidolon with wings like a dragon serves an evil god. Believed to be the source of all evil, she is feared by humans."

Anzu.name: Anzu
Anzu.summonAttackEffect: Thunder DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies' Double Attack rate↑
Anzu.description: "This Eidolon, capable of controlling electricity, belongs to a band of thieves. The lithograph she wears was stolen from an ancient god."

Apocalypse.name: Apocalypse
Apocalypse.summonAttackEffect: Dark DMG to all enemies(++++) / Applies Blindness
Apocalypse.description: "Born amid chaos, she possesses fearsome magic power. Strong enough to end the world all over again, her power is very dangerous."

Aqua Kaiser Dragoon.name: Aqua Kaiser Dragoon
Aqua Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Guardian Ice of the Dragon Emperor
Aqua Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttackEffect: All allies' Water ATK↑(++) / Fire RST↑(++)
Aqua Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Divine Shield of the Water Dragon
Aqua Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Water characters' Healing Ability recovery power↑
Aqua Kaiser Dragoon.description: "An Eidolon with the power of an absolute zero icy wind. Her icy nature is both beautiful and cruel."

Aqua Spirit.name: Aqua Spirit
Aqua Spirit.description: "An Eidolon transformed into a spirit by water magic.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Arachne.name: Arachne
Arachne.description: "A beautiful woman with a giant spider as a familiar.Anyone who finds himself trapped in her indestructible spider web will never escape."

Archangel.name: Archangel
Archangel.summonAttackEffect:
Light DMG to all enemies (++++)
Reduces Mode Gauge
Archangel.description: "Disdanful of boord, this Eidolon loves seets and wants to be a refined woman.They say her holy sword will protect the heavens for all eternity"

Aurora Dragoon.name: Aurora Dragoon
Aurora Dragoon.summonAttackEffect: Water DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies' Water ATK↑ / Fire RST↑
Aurora Dragoon.description: "A member of a dragon series created to be guardian beasts. Possessing the power of ice, she can protect herself with powerful blasts of cold air."

Baby Dragon.name: Baby Dragon
Baby Dragon.description: "The child of a god-like dragon that controls various natural phenomena.Her power doesn't yet match an adult dragon's, but is astounding to human."

Balrog.name: Balrog
Balrog.description: "An Eidolon created in an incubation tank and confined for ages. Her hatred for humans is embodied on her jet-black shadow dress."

Basilisk.name: Basilisk
Basilisk.description: "An Eidolon with the power to turn those she looks upon to stone. Despite her fearsome looks, she's supposedly scared of ghosts."

Behemoth.name: Behemoth
Behemoth.summonAttackEffect: Wind DMG to all enemies(++++) / Recovers 1 affliction for all allies
Behemoth.description: "A guardian Eidolon that can use nano machines to manipulate the wind. The hippo is said to be her other self. She's lazy by nature."

Cat Sith.name: Cat Sith
Cat Sith.description: "This Eidolon, evolved from a cat, can speak human languages and walk on two legs.They say she's actually all that is left of the cat king."

Cetus.name: Cetus
Cetus.summonAttackEffect: Water DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies' DEF↑
Cetus.description: "An Eidolon who was sealed in stone at the bottom of the sea. She swims the seas of the world in search of the person who freed her."

Chaos Spirit.name: Chaos Spirit
Chaos Spirit.description: "A materialized chaos spirit Eidolon.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Chimera.name: Chimera
Chimera.description: "Created through an experiment to combine a variety of different monsters, no one knows how many monsters reside in her body now."

Cthugha.name: Cthugha
Cthugha.summonAttackEffect:
Fire DMG to all enemies(++++)
Applies  Scorched
Cthugha.description: "A living flame, this Eidolon hold immense power. When fighting, her own sleepiness can become an obstacle, which angers her greatly."

Crom Cruach.name: Crom Cruach
Crom Cruach.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Fist of the Fire Dragon
Crom Cruach.summonAttackEffect: Fire DMG to all enemies(++++) /  Double Attack rate↓ (+)
Crom Cruach.description: "A fire dragon whose anger manifests in flame, burning everything in sight.A flap of her blazing wing is powerful enough to decimate an entire city."
Crom Cruach.obtained: Raging Fury of the Inferno Dragon

Cyclone Spirit.name: Cyclone Spirit
Cyclone Spirit.description: "A materialized wind spirit Eidolon.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Dark Spirit.name: Dark Spirit
Dark Spirit.description: "An Eidolon transformed into a spirit by dark magic.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Diabolos.name: Diabolos
Diabolos.description: "A magical being created just as the creator gods vanished.Though cold blooded, cruel, and philosophical, she can be helpful at times."

Dryad.name: Dryad
Dryad.description: "A beautiful Eidolon who rules trees.Extremely kind, she rarely appears before people, but mercilessly defends the forest."

Dullahan.name: Dullahan
Dullahan.summonAttackEffect:
Dark DMG to all enemies(++++)
 Applies  Putrefied
Dullahan.description: "There's no escaping this messenger of death Eidolon.The only way to beat destiny is to face her head on."

Echidna.name: Echidna
Echidna.summonAttackEffect: Dark DMG to all enemies(++++) / Applies Dizziness
Echidna.description: "A legendary Eidolon who has given birth to countless monsters. She steals a man's seed before killing him like a deranged mantis."

Electro Spirit.name: Electro Spirit
Electro Spirit.description: "A materialized thunder spirit Eidolon.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Evil Kaiser Dragoon.name: Evil Kaiser Dragoon
Evil Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Guardian Darkness of the Dragon Emperor
Evil Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttackEffect: All allies'  Dark ATK↑(++) /  Light RST↑(++)
Evil Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Divine Shield of the Dark Dragon
Evil Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Dark characters' Healing Ability recovery power↑
Evil Kaiser Dragoon.description: "Mentally, the youngest of all the dragoons,her ability to commit cruel acts without a second thought makes her dangerous."

Fafnir.name: Fafnir
Fafnir.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Golden Dragon's Radiant Flame
Fafnir.summonAttackEffect:
Fire DMG to all enemies (++++)
All allies'  ATK /  DEF↑ (++)
Fafnir.description: "Feeding off Greed and Treachery, Fafnir is an Eidolon harboring the strength of the Dragons.She was originally human that was cursed. Her greed for gold is beyond measure as well as her selfishness."

Fenrir.name: Fenrir
Fenrir.summonAttackEffect: Water DMG to all enemies(++++) / All allies' ability DMG↑
Fenrir.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Water character's ATK↑ 50% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Fenrir.eidolonEffectTier1Effect: Water character's ATK↑ 55% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Fenrir.eidolonEffectTier4Effect: Water character's ATK↑ 70% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 30%
Fenrir.description: "This Eidolon was sleeping in a glacier. Typically a giant, she can shrink herself at will. Her ice magic is top class, even among Eidolons."

Fire Spirit.name: Fire Spirit
Fire Spirit.description: "An Eidolon transformed into a spirit by fire magic.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Flame Spirit.name: Flame Spirit
Flame Spirit.description: "A materialized flame spirit Eidolon.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Frost Spirit.name: Frost Spirit
Frost Spirit.description: "A materialized water spirit Eidolon.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Furfur.name: Furfur
Furfur.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Magical Circle of Truth
Furfur.description: "Capable of summoning thunderstorms, this demon Eidolon holds the title of countess. She loves tales of romance and is up on all the latest trends."

Gale Kaiser Dragoon.name: Gale Kaiser Dragoon
Gale Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Guardian Wind of the Dragon Emperor
Gale Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttackEffect: All allies' Wind ATK↑(++) / Thunder RST↑(++)
Gale Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Divine Shield of the Wind Dragon
Gale Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Wind characters' Healing Ability recovery power↑
Gale Kaiser Dragoon.description: "The highest ranked elemental dragoon. Her attacks are a marvel to behold and the divine protection of her wind is tremendously powerful."

Gandharva.name: Gandharva
Gandharva.description: "An Eidolon who belongs to a religious music group. With beautiful golden wings, she's very good at using the wind to attack."

Gargoyle (N).name: Gargoyle (N)
Gargoyle (N).description: "This Eidolon was petrified as punishment for her pranks.Even after being freed, she is still most comfortable on a slab of slate."

Garm.name: Garm
Garm.description: "An extremely loyal Eidolon also known by the name "Watchdog."Loyal to those she knows, she's merciless to enemies."

Garuda.name: Garuda
Garuda.summonAttackEffect: Wind DMG to all enemies(++++) / Double Attack rate↑
Garuda.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Magic Gale of the Bird King
Garuda.description: "After drinking the sacred Amrita water of immortality, this Eidolon gained extraordinary power.Her wind attacks boast a truly awesome destructive power."

God Kaiser Dragoon.name: God Kaiser Dragoon
God Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Guardian Light of the Dragon Emperor
God Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttackEffect: All allies' Light ATK↑(++) / Dark RST↑(++)
God Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Divine Shield of the Light Dragon
God Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Light characters' Healing Ability recovery power↑
God Kaiser Dragoon.description: "A god-like Eidolon with the power to purify the world. Benevolent and loving, she provides divine protection to anyone who asks for help."

Golem.name: Golem
Golem.description: "A manipulative Eidolon who made a golden metal giant fall in love with her.The gold giant was a tool of war, but now it's only for her own personal use."

Gremlin.name: Gremlin
Gremlin.description: "Turned into an Eidolon while messing about at a weapons factory, she may look cute, but she hates humans for making her into an Eidolon."

Girimehkala.name: Girimehkala
Girimehkala.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Shake Heavens and Earth
Girimehkala.summonAttackEffect: Thunder DMG to all enemies(++++) / Applies Cursed
Girimehkala.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Thunder characters' ATK↑ 50% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Girimehkala.description: "Accompanied by a mechanical elephant, this Eidolon is a weapon of war.Her elephant's charge shakes the earth, destroying all in its path."

Griffin.name: Griffin
Griffin.description: "An Eidolon originally created to guard a weapons research facility.Now that the facility is gone, she wanders about, in search of something to protect."

Guilty Dragoon.name: Guilty Dragoon
Guilty Dragoon.summonAttackEffect: Dark DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies' Dark ATK↑ / Light RST↑
Guilty Dragoon.description: "A member of a dragon series created to be guardian beasts. Mostly provides dark magic power, but can also be used for defense."

Harpie (N).name: Harpie (N)
Harpie (N).description: "Half human, half vulture, this beast was created as a weapon.She has a voracious appetite and is known to eat humans and monsters on occasion."

Hecatonchires.name: Hecatonchires
Hecatonchires.summonAttackEffect: Light DMG to all enemies(++++) / DEF↑(++)
Hecatonchires.description: "An Eidolon with mechanical arms and a strong sense of justice, she lets no evil go unpunished, though she can go a bit overboard on occasion."

Hellhound.name: Hellhound
Hellhound.description: "A canine Eidolon with fiery red eyes.Her howl is said to announce destinations to the souls of the departed."

Holy Spirit.name: Holy Spirit
Holy Spirit.description: "A materialized light spirit Eidolon.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Homunculus.name: Homunculus
Homunculus.description: "An android made by a legendary alchemist.Her master is dead, but she's still searching for him, wandering about with a forlorn look on her face."

Huanglong.name: Huanglong
Huanglong.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Fury of the Dragon God
Huanglong.summonAttackEffect: Thunder DMG to all enemies(++++) / Extends Stun
Huanglong.description: "Made in an attempt to create a god and boasting immense power, her attacks, powerful as nuclear bombs, are the embodiment of divine wrath."

Hydra.name: Hydra
Hydra.description: "A fire breathing Eidolon with the heads of five snakes. Possesses the ability to regenerate.If one head is cut off, it will grow back."

Ifrit.name: Ifrit
Ifrit.summonAttackEffect: Fire DMG to all enemies(++++) / All allies  ATK↑ (++)
Ifrit.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Fire characters' ATK↑ 50% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Ifrit.eidolonEffectTier1Effect: Fire characters' ATK↑ 55% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Ifrit.eidolonEffectTier2Effect: Fire characters' ATK↑ 60% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Ifrit.eidolonEffectTier3Effect: Fire characters' ATK↑ 65% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Ifrit.eidolonEffectTier4Effect: Fire characters' ATK↑ 70% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Ifrit.description: "A fire demon Eidolon. She'll grant one wish for whomever she serves, but she will ask to be appropriately compensated for her wish granting."

Ignited Dragoon.name: Ignited Dragoon
Ignited Dragoon.summonAttackEffect: Fire DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies' Fire ATK↑ / Wind RST↑
Ignited Dragoon.description: "A member of a dragon series created to be guardian beasts. The flames shrouding her body are so hot that it's difficuly to get near her."

Ixion.name: Ixion
Ixion.summonAttackEffect:
Thunder DMG to all enemies(++++)
Applies  Thunder ATK↑ (+) to allies
Ixion.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Thunder characters' ATK↑ 20% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Ixion.eidolonEffectTier1Effect: Thunder characters' ATK↑ 25% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Ixion.eidolonEffectTier2Effect: Thunder characters' ATK↑ 25% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 25%
Ixion.eidolonEffectTier3Effect: Thunder characters' ATK↑ 30% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 25%
Ixion.eidolonEffectTier4Effect: Thunder characters' ATK↑ 30% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 30%
Ixion.description: "An Eidolon who treats humans as slaves. Long ago, she trappedand killed her sister. Now, she must pay for her sin for all eternity."

Jabberwock.name: Jabberwock
Jabberwock.summonAttackEffect: Wind DMG to all enemies(++++) / Applies Poison
Jabberwock.description: "The Eidolon who once ruled over the "Mirror Kingdom." Sealed away by a little girl, half her power was stolen, but she's still pretty strong."

Jormungandr.name: Jormungandr
Jormungandr.summonAttackEffect: Water DMG to all enemies(++++) / ATK↓ (+)
Jormungandr.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Blood of the World Serpent
Jormungandr.description: "A giant Eidolon who was sealed at the bottom of the sea by the thunder god Thor. On a rampage trying to find the Kamihime who sealed her."

Kraken.name: Kraken
Kraken.description: "An Eidolon with the head of a giant squid.She looks cute, but let your guard down around her and she'll attack you with her suckers."

Laelaps.name: Laelaps
Laelaps.description: "Laelaps never fails to catch her prey.Like a dog, she'd follow her master's orders even if it meant chasing an enemy into the depths of hell."

Lamia.name: Lamia
Lamia.summonAttackEffect: Dark DMG to all enemies(++) / Applies Blindness
Lamia.description: "This wildly libidinous Eidolon enjoys younger men. With her power, she'd be able to challenge dragons if she ever decided to fight seriously."

Lightning Dragoon.name: Lightning Dragoon
Lightning Dragoon.summonAttackEffect: Thunder DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies'  Thunder ATK↑ /  Water RST↑
Lightning Dragoon.description: "A member of a dragon series created to be guardian beasts.Creates powerful electric currents in her body, always electrified."

Lilim Luxuria.name: Lilim Luxuria
Lilim Luxuria.summonAttackEffect:
Wind DMG to all enemies(++++)
All allies' Wind ATK↑
Lilim Luxuria.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: When your team has three or more elements, Wind characters' ATK↑ 50%
Lilim Luxuria.eidolonEffectTier1Effect: When your team has three or more elements, Wind characters' ATK↑ 55%
Lilim Luxuria.eidolonEffectTier2Effect: When your team has three or more elements, Wind characters' ATK↑ 60%
Lilim Luxuria.eidolonEffectTier3Effect: When your team has three or more elements, Wind characters' ATK↑ 65%
Lilim Luxuria.eidolonEffectTier4Effect: When your team has three or more elements, Wind characters' ATK↑ 70%
Lilim Luxuria.description: "An Eidolon who serves Demon Lust. She is confident in her sexiness, but her clumsiness prevents her from exploiting it."
Lilim Luxuria.obtained: Crucible of Combat vs The Demon: Lust

Lindwurm.name: Lindwurm
Lindwurm.summonAttackEffect: Wind DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies' Recovery Power↑
Lindwurm.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Shooting Star of the Winged Wind
Lindwurm.description: "Created in the general image of a dragon. She breathes fire, of course, but she's not very good at it and has developed a complex as a result."

Lorelei.name: Lorelei
Lorelei.description: "A woman who, betrayed by her lover, threw herself into the sea.The sound of her harp is sad but beautiful, once it captures a heart, it never lets go."

Maneater.name: Maneater
Maneater.description: "A vicious, predatory monster that feeds on people.She doesn't usual attack when she's full, but stay away from Maneater when she's hungry."

Manticore.name: Manticore
Manticore.summonAttackEffect: Dark DMG to all enemies(++) / Enemy Combo Attack rate↓
Manticore.description: "Equal parts lion, poisonous insect, and human, Chimera was born of war. She longs for the day she'll be able to live a happy, normal human life."

Mastema.name: Mastema
Mastema.summonAttackEffect:
Thunder DMG to all enemies(++++)
Applies  Dizziness
Mastema.description: "A synthetic thunder Eidolon. She has workshipped and desiredyou since you saved her. Her love for you borders on madness."

Medusa.name: Medusa
Medusa.summonAttackEffect:
Dark DMG to all enemies(++++)
Applies  Poisoned
Medusa.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Kin of Noble Darkness
Medusa.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Dark characters' ATK↑ 20% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Medusa.eidolonEffectTier1Effect: Dark characters' ATK↑ 25% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Medusa.eidolonEffectTier2Effect: Dark characters' ATK↑ 25% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 25%
Medusa.eidolonEffectTier3Effect: Dark characters' ATK↑ 30% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 25%
Medusa.eidolonEffectTier4Effect: Dark characters' ATK↑ 30% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 30%
Medusa.description: "An evil snake Eidolon who turns those who look upon her to stone. She was once beheaded, but a mad scientist gave her a new body."

Melusine.name: Melusine
Melusine.summonAttackEffect: Water DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies ATK↑
Melusine.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Kiss from the Serpent King
Melusine.description: "A vicious Eidolon sealed away for her evil deeds, she can turn a human into a lump of ice in an instant. She is capricious and violent."

Mermaid (N).name: Mermaid (N)
Mermaid (N).description: "A sea-dwelling Eidolon with the lower body of a fish.When she spots a man who looks like her type, she drags him into the sea."

Mimic (N).name: Mimic (N)
Mimic (N).description: "Skilled at mimicry, this Eidolon disguises herself as a treasure chest, a camouflage not even experienced adventurers can see through."

Minotaur (N).name: Minotaur (N)
Minotaur (N).description: "A half-human, half-cow Eidolon.Minotaur may not look fast, but she's quick and accurate with an axe."

Naga.name: Naga
Naga.description: "A serpent Eidolon with the ability to control the weather.Easily swayed by emotions, her feelings have even caused droughts."

Nekhbet.name: Nekhbet
Nekhbet.description: "Though created to protect the king of the land with magical science, no science could prevent the king's death and the country's destruction."

Nightmare.name: Nightmare
Nightmare.description: "This demon plants the seeds of nightmares in people's minds and feeds off of their suffering."

Nova Kaiser Dragoon.name: Nova Kaiser Dragoon
Nova Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Guardian Flame of the Dragon Emperor -
Nova Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttackEffect:
All allies'  Fire ATK↑ (++) /  Wind RST↑ (++) (Limit Break ☆☆☆☆)
All allies'  Fire ATK↑ (+++) /  Wind RST↑ (++) (Limit Break ★☆☆☆)
Nova Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Divine Shield of the Fire Dragon
Nova Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Fire characters' Healing Ability recovery power↑
Nova Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonEffectTier1Effect: Fire characters' Healing Ability recovery power↑ +1
Nova Kaiser Dragoon.description: "This Eidolon has the unrivaled power of a supernova.She likes to keep things plain and simple, charging powerfully into any situation."

Orc (N).name: Orc (N)
Orc (N).description: "A ubiquitous eidolon found in grasslands and village fields.They reproduce so fast that no matter how many you kill, they'll never die out."

Orthrus.name: Orthrus
Orthrus.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Roar of the Demon Beast
Orthrus.summonAttackEffect: Fire DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies' Recovery Power↑
Orthrus.description: "She stores powerful magic in the scarf around her neck. It's said that she has a lost sister that she's still searching for."

Ouroboros.name: Ouroboros
Ouroboros.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Cycle of Death and Rebirth
Ouroboros.summonAttackEffect: Dark DMG to all enemies(++++) / Applies Blindness
Ouroboros.description: "The emotionless, evil dragon who rules infinity. She thinks of human men merely as tools for procreation."

Pegasus.name: Pegasus
Pegasus.summonAttackEffect: Light DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies' ATK↑
Pegasus.description: "A sacred beast who protects the world as the guardian of light. Pure and sincere, lately she's been worrying that she's too gullible."

Phoenix.name: Phoenix
Phoenix.summonAttackEffect: Light DMG to all enemies(++++) / All allies'  Affliction RST↑(+)
Phoenix.description: "An Eidolon who rarely appears before others. Just meeting her is said to be good luck. She loves shiny things and obeys her desires."

Pixie.name: Pixie
Pixie.description: "A fairy Eidolon, created to be a pet in the pre-Ragnarok world.Pixies have a temper, but are loyal to their own kind."

Prison of Darkness, Disaster.name: Prison of Darkness, Disaster
Prison of Darkness, Disaster.description: "An endless prison of darkness, her awesome power can cause catastrophic damage. She has transformed into a malicious force of devastation."

Prison of Fire, Disaster.name: Prison of Fire, Disaster
Prison of Fire, Disaster.description: "An endless prison of fire, her awesome power can cause catastrophic damage. She has transformed into a malicious force of devastation."

Prison of Ice, Disaster.name: Prison of Ice, Disaster
Prison of Ice, Disaster.description: "An endless prison of ice, her awesome power can cause catastrophic damage. She has transformed into a malicious force of devastation."

Prison of Light, Disaster.name: Prison of Light, Disaster
Prison of Light, Disaster.description: "An endless prison of light, her awesome power can cause catastrophic damage. She has transformed into a malicious force of devastation."

Prison of Lightning, Disaster.name: Prison of Lightning, Disaster
Prison of Lightning, Disaster.description: "An endless prison of lightning, her awesome power can cause catastrophic damage. She has transformed into a malicious force of devastation."

Prison of Wind, Disaster.name: Prison of Wind, Disaster
Prison of Wind, Disaster.description: "An endless prison of wind, her awesome power can cause catastrophic damage. She has transformed into a malicious force of devastation."

Pulse Kaiser Dragoon.name: Pulse Kaiser Dragoon
Pulse Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Guardian Thunder of the Dragon Emperor
Pulse Kaiser Dragoon.summonAttackEffect:
All allies' Thunder ATK↑(++) / Water RST↑(++) (Limit Break ☆☆☆☆)
All allies' Thunder ATK↑(+++) / Water RST↑(++) (Limit Break ★☆☆☆)
Pulse Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Divine Shield of the Lightning Dragon
Pulse Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Thunder characters' Healing Ability recovery power↑
Pulse Kaiser Dragoon.eidolonEffectTier1Effect: Thunder characters' Healing Ability recovery power↑ +1
Pulse Kaiser Dragoon.description: "Whatever this thunder Eidolon does, she does it fast. Her thunder is powerful enough to turn reduce an enemy to ash in the blink of an eye."

Quetzalcoatl.name: Quetzalcoatl
Quetzalcoatl.summonAttackEffect: Wind DMG to all enemies(++++) / Ability DMG↑
Quetzalcoatl.description: "A polite, peace-loving Eidolon who may go on a violent rampage when drunk."

Radon.name: Radon
Radon.summonAttackEffect: Fire DMG to all enemies(++) / Reduces enemy Mode Gauge
Radon.description: "An Eidolon with a hundred-headed dragon who guards a holy apple tree. All one hundred heads can breathe fire."

Rahab.name: Rahab
Rahab.summonAttackEffect:
Water DMG to all enemies(++++)
Applies  Thunder RST↑ (+) to allies
Rahab.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Water Dragon's Icy Blood
Rahab.description: "A giant Eidolon mesmerized by her own beauty.Thanks to her large size, the waves she creates can cause disaster-level damage."

Ray Dragoon.name: Ray Dragoon
Ray Dragoon.summonAttackEffect: Light DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies' Light ATK↑ / Dark RST↑
Ray Dragoon.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Flashing Light Dragon's Valor
Ray Dragoon.description: "A member of a dragon series created to be guardian beasts. Part angel, she's capable of purifying anything with a magical light."

Salamander.name: Salamander
Salamander.summonAttackEffect: Fire DMG to all enemies(++) / Applies Scorched
Salamander.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Flame Spirit of Steel Claws
Salamander.description: "A ferocious Eidolon who lives in a volcanic area. Covered in scales stronger than steel, she is highly heat resistant."

Sandalphon.name: Sandalphon
Sandalphon.summonAttackEffect: Thunder DMG to all enemies(++++) / Triple Attack rate↑
Sandalphon.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Electric Feather of Silver-White
Sandalphon.description: "A mechanized archangel Eidolon. Her manueverability and unparalleled accuracy make it impossible to dodge her attacks."

Scylla.name: Scylla
Scylla.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Scent of a Hound
Scylla.description: "Once a beautiful spirit of the sea, a curse merged with a dog. Able to control water, she spends most of her time in the water."

Sea Serpent.name: Sea Serpent
Sea Serpent.description: "Made in the likeness of a legendary pre-Ragnarok beast and known for her mane-like hair, she is also known as the "Great Sea Serpent.""

Sephiroth.name: Sephiroth
Sephiroth.summonAttackEffect: Wind DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies'  DEF↑
Sephiroth.description: "Once the spirit of a giant tree that supports the earth. This Eidolon supposedly lives to guard the fruit of the tree and the holy grail."

Shine Spirit.name: Shine Spirit
Shine Spirit.description: "An Eidolon transformed into a spirit by light magic.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Siren (N).name: Siren (N)
Siren (N).description: "An Eidolon made in a coastal country to steal aboard enemy ships.She uses her beautiful voice to steal the hearts of men before devouring them."

Sleipnir.name: Sleipnir
Sleipnir.summonAttackEffect: Wind DMG to all enemies(++++) / Increases Burst Gauge
Sleipnir.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Wind characters' ATK↑ 50% / Item drop rate↑
Sleipnir.eidolonEffectTier4Effect: Wind characters' ATK↑ 70% / Item drop rate↑ +
Sleipnir.description: "Wind surrounds this Eidolon. Her eight legs and large size allow her to trample any enemy who crosses her path."

Slime.name: Slime
Slime.description: "A shape-shifter, this Eidolon controls gelatinous creatures.You'll be begging for death if she tricks you while changed into a cute form."

Succubus.name: Succubus
Succubus.description: "Succubus thirsts for the seed of man.Men who fall into her clutches are destined to die a peaceful death while experiencing the ultimate bliss."

Sugaar.name: Sugaar
Sugaar.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Visions of a Storm
Sugaar.description: "Capable of creating electricity on a cellular level, this dragon can send out powerful electric shocks. Her fierce disposition makes her dangerous."

Surtr.name: Surtr
Surtr.summonAttackEffect: Fire DMG to all enemies(++) / Applies Scorched
Surtr.description: "A god who controls a fire giant who, at his largest, is bigger than a mountain. The giant can change size, so she usually uses him as a vehicle."

Sylph (N).name: Sylph (N)
Sylph (N).description: "One of the four great spirits, this Eidolon rules over the wind.Capable of controlling the air, she can even make herself disappear."

Takemikazuchi.name: Takemikazuchi
Takemikazuchi.summonAttackEffect: Thunder DMG to all enemies(++++) / Increases all allies' Burst Gauge
Takemikazuchi.description: "A thunder Eidolon who wields a thunder sword. Extroverted, this hero once led troops in battle."

Tempest Dragoon.name: Tempest Dragoon
Tempest Dragoon.summonAttackEffect: Wind DMG to all enemies(++) / All allies' Wind ATK↑ / Thunder RST↑
Tempest Dragoon.description: "A member of a dragon series created to be guardian beasts. Uses the protective power of wind to cover and provide support."

Thunder Spirit.name: Thunder Spirit
Thunder Spirit.description: "An Eidolon transformed into a spirit by thunder magic.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Thunderbird.name: Thunderbird
Thunderbird.summonAttackEffect: Thunder DMG to all enemies(++++) / All allies' Double Attack rate↑ (++)
Thunderbird.eidolonsEffect: Eidolon Effect - Raijin's Flock of Electrified Wings
Thunderbird.description: "A thunderbird Eidolon who stores thunder in her beautiful, glowing wings. She uses lightning, easily twisting the bolts' trajectory to toy with her foes."

Typhon.name: Typhon
Typhon.summonAttackEffect: Fire DMG to all enemies(++++) / All allies ATK↑ (+)
Typhon.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Fire characters' ATK↑ 20% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Typhon.eidolonEffectTier1Effect: Fire characters' ATK↑ 25% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Typhon.eidolonEffectTier2Effect: Fire characters' ATK↑ 25% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 25%
Typhon.eidolonEffectTier3Effect: Fire characters' ATK↑ 30% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 25%
Typhon.eidolonEffectTier4Effect: Fire characters' ATK↑ 30% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 30%
Typhon.description: "An Eidolon with nonstandard fighting skills. She's trying to get Ragnarok's power in order to regain the power she possessed in her heyday."

Unicorn.name: Unicorn
Unicorn.description: "An especially good fighter, even among Eidolons. They say the horn on her head can cure any illness."

Vampire.name: Vampire
Vampire.description: "Mankind's natural enemy, Vampire tricks men to suck their blood.She has many weaknesses, but her strength more than makes up for those."

Vritra.name: Vritra
Vritra.summonAttack: Summon Attack - Sea Lance of Annihlation
Vritra.summonAttackEffect:
Water DMG to all enemies (++++)
Applies  Drowned
Vritra.eidolonEffectTier0Effect: Water Characters' ATK↑ 20% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Vritra.eidolonEffectTier1Effect: Water Characters' ATK↑ 25% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 20%
Vritra.eidolonEffectTier2Effect: Water Characters' ATK↑ 25% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 25%
Vritra.eidolonEffectTier3Effect: Water Characters' ATK↑ 30% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 25%
Vritra.eidolonEffectTier4Effect: Water Characters' ATK↑ 30% / Burst Streak DMG↑ 30%
Vritra.description: "A youthful Eidolon who controls water.So greedy that she covets the entire world and has stolen entire cities' water supplies, destroying them."

Will-o'-Wisp.name: Will-o'-Wisp
Will-o'-Wisp.description: "As punishment for her sins in the pre-Ragnarok world she was given an immortal body. She, however, enjoys her unique body to the fullest."

Wind Spirit.name: Wind Spirit
Wind Spirit.description: "An Eidolon transformed into a spirit by wind magic.Able to access latent magic by connecting with the souls of other Eidolon."

Wood Nymph (N).name: Wood Nymph (N)
Wood Nymph (N).description: "A fairy Eidolon built in the pre-Ragnarok world.A die-hard prankster, she often attacks people."

Worm.name: Worm
Worm.description: "An Eidolon who fights with the tentacles that come out of the bag on her back."

Wyvern.name: Wyvern
Wyvern.description: "Based on a dragon, this Eidolon was worshipped as the symbol of a nation.She was loyal during the war, but is more capricious these days."

Yamata no Orochi.name: Yamata no Orochi
Yamata no Orochi.summonAttackEffect: Water DMG to all enemies(++) / Enemy DEF↓
Yamata no Orochi.description: "A great serpent princess who ruled over a small nation of oriental culture. She desires to create descendants with a worthy man."

Yatagarasu.name: Yatagarasu
Yatagarasu.summonAttackEffect: Fire DMG to all enemies(++++) /  ATK↓ (+)
Yatagarasu.description: "An ambitious cartographer Eidolon who guards the sun's path. She is tempermental but, adorably, loves shiny things."

Yggdrasil.name: Yggdrasil
Yggdrasil.summonAttackEffect:
Thunder DMG to all enemies(++++)
Applies  Regeneration to all allies
Yggdrasil.description: "This Eidolon, born from the tree of life, thirsts for energy.She assimilates machines to grow and become more powerful."
Yggdrasil.obtained: The World Tree's Seed of Despair

Yinglong.name: Yinglong
Yinglong.summonAttackEffect: Thunder DMG to all enemies(++) / All enemy ATK↓
Yinglong.description: "A dragon girl created by a program focused on justice. She punishes evil, intent on bringing justice to the new world."
